Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Wings = Tool.Handle
local Character local Player
local Torso local Humanoid local Head
Tool.Enabled = true
local JumpConnection local HeadConnection
local Debris = Game:GetService('Debris')
local BASE_URL = "http://www.roblox.com"
local RightWing = Instance.new('Part') RightWing.FormFactor = 3 RightWing.Size = Vector3.new(1, 2, 1) RightWing.CanCollide = false RightWing.Name = 'RightWing'
local Fire = Instance.new('Fire') Fire.Parent = RightWing Fire.Color = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) Fire.Enabled = false
local RightWingMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') RightWingMesh.MeshId = BASE_URL .. "/asset/?id=117468194" RightWingMesh.TextureId = BASE_URL .. "/asset/?id=117468135" RightWingMesh.Parent = RightWing
local LeftWing = Instance.new('Part') LeftWing.FormFactor = 3 LeftWing.Size = Vector3.new(1, 3, 1) LeftWing.Name = 'LeftWing' LeftWing.CanCollide = false
local LeftWingMesh = RightWingMesh:Clone() LeftWingMesh.MeshId = BASE_URL .. "/asset/?id=117468191" LeftWingMesh.Parent = LeftWing
local LFire = Fire:Clone() LFire.Parent = LeftWeld
local RightWeld local LeftWeld
local NewBV = nil local NewBG = nil local NewBAV = nil local NewBP = nil
local Flapping = false local InDash = false
local WingDamage = 5
local function LightenUp(hPart, wing, head) if hPart and hPart.Parent and wing and wing.Parent then local humanoid = hPart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hPart.Parent:IsA('Hat') and hPart.Parent.Parent then humanoid = hPart.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') end if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(WingDamage) if wing:FindFirstChild('Fire') and not humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild('WaspFireScript') then local wScript = Tool:WaitForChild('WaspFireScript'):Clone() wScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent wScript.Disabled = false end end end end
local function FlapWings(duration) duration = duration or 1.0 Flapping = true local rCFrame = RightWeld.C1 local lCFrame = LeftWeld.C1
local count = 1 local anglePerFrame = 0.025
if LeftWing:FindFirstChild('Fire') then LeftWing.Fire.Enabled = true end
if RightWing:FindFirstChild('Fire') then RightWing.Fire.Enabled = true end
while duration > 0 do LeftWeld.C1 = LeftWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, anglePerFrame * (count%6), 0) RightWeld.C1 = RightWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, -anglePerFrame * (count%6), 0) if count%6 == 0 then anglePerFrame = -anglePerFrame end count = count + 1 duration = duration - wait() wait() end
RightWeld.C1 = rCFrame LeftWeld.C1 = lCFrame
if LeftWing:FindFirstChild('Fire') then LeftWing.Fire.Enabled = false end
if RightWing:FindFirstChild('Fire') then RightWing.Fire.Enabled = false end Flapping = false end
local function WaspDash()
local target = Humanoid.TargetPoint
InDash = true
Spawn(function() FlapWings(5.0) end)
local direction = (target - Torso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) if direction.magnitude < .01 then Tool.Enabled = true return end direction = direction.unit
local tPosition = Torso.Position
NewBG = Instance.new("BodyGyro") NewBG.P = 30000 NewBG.maxTorque = Vector3.new(NewBG.P, NewBG.P, NewBG.P)
NewBG.cframe = CFrame.new(tPosition, target * Vector3.new(1,0,1) + Vector3.new(0, tPosition.Y, 0) ) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) NewBG.Parent = Torso
NewBP = Instance.new("BodyPosition") NewBP.P = 100000 NewBP.maxForce = Vector3.new(NewBP.P, NewBP.P, NewBP.P) NewBP.position = tPosition + Vector3.new(0, 0.25, 0) NewBP.Parent = Torso
NewBAV = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") NewBAV.P = 100000 NewBAV.maxTorque = Vector3.new(NewBAV.P, NewBAV.P, NewBAV.P)
NewBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") NewBV.P = 100000 NewBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(NewBV.P, 0, NewBV.P) NewBV.velocity = direction * 100
wait(0.5)
NewBG.maxTorque = Vector3.new(NewBP.P, 0, NewBP.P) NewBP.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, NewBP.P, 0) NewBV.Parent = Torso
NewBAV.Parent = Torso wait(1.5)
if NewBAV ~= nil then NewBAV:Destroy() end if NewBP ~= nil then NewBP:Destroy() end if NewBV ~= nil then NewBV:Destroy() end
if NewBG ~= nil then NewBG.cframe = CFrame.new(tPosition, target * Vector3.new(1,0,1) + Vector3.new(0, tPosition.Y, 0) ) end if NewBG ~= nil then NewBG.maxTorque = Vector3.new(NewBG.P, NewBG.P, NewBG.P) end
wait(.25)
if NewBG ~= nil then NewBG:Destroy() end InDash = false end
local function OnActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
if not Torso or not Humanoid then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
WaspDash()
wait(2.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
local function OnEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Torso = Character:WaitForChild('Torso') Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild('Humanoid') Head = Character:WaitForChild('Head')
Wings.Transparency = 1.0
JumpConnection = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(property) if property == 'Jump' and Humanoid['Jump'] == true then if Flapping == false then FlapWings() end end end)
if RightWeld and LeftWeld then RightWeld.Parent = Torso LeftWeld.Parent = Torso RightWing.Parent = Torso LeftWing.Parent = Torso elseif RightWing.Parent ~= Character then RightWing.Parent = Character
RightWeld = Instance.new('Weld') RightWeld.Parent = Torso RightWeld.Name = 'RightWingWeld' RightWeld.Part0 = Torso RightWeld.Part1 = RightWing
LeftWeld = Instance.new('Weld') LeftWeld.Parent = Torso LeftWeld.Name = 'LeftWingWeld' LeftWeld.Part0 = Torso LeftWeld.Part1 = LeftWing
LeftWing.Parent = Character
LeftWeld.C1 = LeftWeld.C1 + Vector3.new(0.3, 0, 0) RightWeld.C1 = RightWeld.C1 + Vector3.new(-0.3, 0, 0) end
RightWing.Touched:connect(function(hPart) LightenUp(hPart, RightWing) end)
LeftWing.Touched:connect(function(hPart) LightenUp(hPart, LeftWing) end)
HeadConnection = Head.Touched:connect(function(hPart) if InDash and RightWing then LightenUp(hPart, RightWing, Head) end end) end
local function OnUnequipped() Wings.Transparency = 0.0
RightWing.Parent = nil LeftWing.Parent = nil RightWeld.Parent = nil LeftWeld.Parent = nil
if JumpConnection then JumpConnection:disconnect() end
if HeadConnection then HeadConnection:disconnect() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated)

local Tool = script.Parent;
local stillEquipped = true function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Character = script.Parent local Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild('Humanoid')
local Fire = Instance.new('Fire') Fire.Color = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) Fire.Parent = Character:WaitForChild('Torso')
Game:GetService('Debris'):AddItem(Fire, 5.5)
local Duration = 4.5
while Duration > 0 do Humanoid:TakeDamage(11) Duration = Duration - wait(0.75) wait(0.75) end
wait(1.0) script:Destroy()
